About Me

Let me tell you a few things...

BIO

I am a 23-year-old, Digital Marketer from Birmingham, UK. I am very passionate and dedicated when it comes to my work. I believe I have a strong foundation of web design and development; with a passion in making web applications that are clean and simple, with a distinct yet elegant design. I am a firm believer in "Success is a journey, not a destination".

In March 2021, I felt that I wasn’t content with my current job as a Delivery Driver. I decided to pursue my true passion of becoming a Digital Marketing Executive; rapidly changing my lifestyle to make a habit of waking up at 5am in the morning in order to study and practise various topics.

I regularly visit the gym for a healthy and fit lifestyle. I enjoy playing various sports such as football, basketball, and boxing. I often head to my local 5 a-side to have a few games of football with some friends/family. This is some good social time for myself and keeps me fit and healthy. I tend to listen to a lot of knowledgeable podcasts whenever I can, especially in the mornings and nights. With my headphones in, it is a good way of turning myself off from the outside world for an hour or so. I, also enjoy designing websites for friends/family, helping out where I can. I have recently taken a keen interest in reading books in my spare time, expanding the depth of my knowledge and keeping myself motivated. For example, "Think and grow rich" is one of the first books which had gotten me into reading. A very interesting book, which promotes self-development.

5 years from now, I would like to see myself in a stable, full time job within the Digital Marketing industry with the possibility of taking a more mid-senior level role. I would also like to boost my networking abilities, stretching it to a place where I haven’t touched on before. I strongly believe by networking correctly, various different opportunities can arise, as well as meeting some good people.
